skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: As a frontend developer, I excel in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, specializing in frameworks like React. With an eye for design and UX, I create engaging, responsive interfaces that prioritize user experience.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: As a backend developer, I specialize in server-side technologies like Node.js, MongoDB, or Python. I build robust APIs, handle data storage, and ensure the functionality and security of web applications.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: As a UI/UX designer, I combine creativity with user-centric design principles to craft visually stunning and intuitive interfaces. Proficient in tool like Figma, I prioritize user experience to create engaging digital products.

skills.title: Development Tools
skills.description: As a developer proficient in tools like Git and GitHub, I effectively manage version control and collaborate with team members. Utilizing features such as branching, merging, and pull requests, I ensure smooth and organized project development.
